theAya:FlightPower.NAME: Flight
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the damage of the next #b
attack you take by 50%.
attacks you take by 50%.

theAya:TenguSpiritPower.NAME: Tengu Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and #b20 #yWind #ySpeed.

theAya:TempestWrathPower.NAME: Tempest Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you are in #yThe #yWind #yof #yWarfare, gain #b
#yStrength.

theAya:GentleBreezePower.NAME: Gentle Breeze
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you are in #yThe #yWind #yof #yHealing, gain #b
#yTemporary #yHP.

theAya:TremblePower.NAME: Tremble
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy will be #yStunned when has #b3 #yTremble.

theAya:AirplaneMode.NAME: Airplane Mode
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b4 #yFlight.

theAya:TrucePower.NAME: Truce
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, gain #b
#yWind #ySpeed, and stop gaining #yWind #ySpeed this turn.

theAya:FieryComboPower.NAME: Fiery Combo
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card while in #yThe #yWind #yof #yWarfare, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theAya:ShiftingTenguPower.NAME: Shifting Tengu
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b10 #yWind #ySpeed each time you switch #yThe #yWind.

theAya:ConvectionPower.NAME: Convection
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies whenever you gain #b30 #yWind #ySpeed.

theAya:PrinterPower.NAME: Printer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, choose #b1 card in your hand to gain its #ySnapshot, and increase its cost by #b1.

theAya:WindTurbinePower.NAME: Wind Turbine
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b20 #yWind #ySpeed, and gain [E].

theAya:LockOnTargetPower.NAME: Lock On Target
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yTengu #yMark and #b1 #yBlack #yFeather to a random enemy.

theAya:TenguMarkPower.NAME: Tengu Mark
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever this enemy takes damage, gain #b2 #yWind #ySpeed, and lose #b1 stack at the end of your turn.

theAya:BlackFeatherPower.NAME: Black Feather
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon death, give you #yFlight equal to the number of stacks.

theAya:BouncingAyaPower.NAME: Bouncing Aya
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose all #yWind #ySpeed, gain #b15 #yWind #ySpeed and #b1 #yFlight, can trigger at most #b10 times per turn.

theAya:NewspaperUpgradePower.NAME: Newspaper Upgrade
DESCRIPTIONS: The cost of the #ySnapshot generated is reduced by #b1.

theAya:UnknownMaruPower.NAME: ?? Maru
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yTremble to a random enemy.

theAya:UpdraftPower.NAME: Updraft
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b1 #yFlight for every #b30 #yWind #ySpeed you have.

theAya:FastestInGensokyoPower.NAME: Fastest In Gensokyo
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b10 #yWind #ySpeed for every #b1 #yFlight you have.
